title: (x) Little America Hotel logo - Castellar (filled) {Mark S}
content:
Hello everyone!  
What is this font??  
Thank you!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Little America.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312080458/http:/typophile.com/files/Little%20America.jpg) | 72.3 KB |
author: misalion

comments.content:
Closest I've been able to find is [FB Garamond Display Regular](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312080458/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/garamond-fb/display-regular/testdrive.html?s=LITTLE+AMERICA+HOTEL&p=48) but it ain't exact.

[Here's](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312080458/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/GaramondFB) the font without the blue lines behind it, but they don't let you do a test drive at Fontbureau.
It's [Castellar](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312080458/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/castellar/mt/testdrive.html?s=LITTLE+AMERICA+HOTEL&p=36) with the highlights filled in.
If there was a way to vote on the new site you'd get 5 stars for that ID, Mark. It was driving me crazy.

You must _feel_ the font flowing through you. Let go of your conscious self and act on instinct. Stretch out with your feelings.

;-)

Try not. Do, or do not. There is no try. :-)

Actually Mark is [not the only](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312080458/http:/66.102.9.104/search?q=cache:e-6zEzmuEOEJ:www.typophile.com/cgibin/discus.pl%3Fpg%3Dnext%26topic%3D83%26page%3D34707+site:typophile.com+castellar&hl=en) Jedi Master to have pulled this off.
Hey Yves, instead of bursting people's bubbles, why not update the IDs????

Because bubble-bursting is less time-consuming. :-D

Actually, I've been absorbed by the Big Fleischmann Bake-Off up till Friday night 03:00 am, so now that's been done with I'm doing the Big Typophile Sunday Clean-up.

BTW Patricia, don't forget I'm not getting paid for this, I'm doing this for those beautiful eyes of yours only. ;-)
